scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../roster-radar-frontend && npm i
scripts.big:server: npm run init:database && npm run populate:database
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run big:server && build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd roster-radar-frontend && npm start"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd roster-radar-frontend && npm run dev"
